reasoning: Pleomorphic adenoma (mixed tumor) is the most common salivary gland tumor, comprising approximately 60-70% of all salivary gland neoplasms. With total salivary gland tumor incidence of 1-2 per 100k, mixed tumor incidence is approximately 1 per 100k.
source: Speight PM, Barrett AW (2002). Salivary gland tumours. Oral Dis. 8(5):229-240
